name: Creatine Monohydrate
explanation: Increases muscle water content and ATP regeneration, boosting strength and power.
instructions: Dose: 3-5g daily, taken consistently. Always stay hydrated.

name: Whey Protein
explanation: Fast-digesting, high-quality protein source, ideal for rapid muscle repair post-workout.
instructions: Dose: 20-40g immediately post-workout or to hit daily protein goals. Note: Best taken post-workout.

name: Casein Protein
explanation: Slow-digesting protein, providing a sustained release of amino acids, ideal before long fasts (like sleep).
instructions: Dose: 20-40g before bed. Note: Excellent pre-sleep protein source.
